ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 73
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh I am not saying it isn t :). I would love to have a Deity of Karana, but then Verrant would think we would be to powerful if we had them & then nerfm
ygData.messageBody:
Oh I am not saying it isn't :). I would love to have a Deity of Karana, but
then Verrant would think we would be to powerful if we had them & then
nerfm'

Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr

Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher
